Settings.LookupUrl: http host address and path or filepath
Settings.AuthHeader: [If SrcPath is a url and auth this field should be set to basic auth or a bearer token]

SettingsV2.ServiceListUrl: http host address and path or filepath that lists services
SettingsV2.ServiceDiscoverUrl: http host address and path or filepath to lookup details for specific services
SettingsV2.AuthHeader: [If SrcPath is a url and auth this field should be set to basic auth or a bearer token]
